content: using only basic crochet stitches and yarn from your stash you can create a gorgeous moss stitch crochet blanket learn how in this step-by-step pattern tutorial it not only includes the pattern i used for my moss stitch crochet blanket but i m also going to guide you through making your own customized moss stitch blanket ***you can get details on how to download the free pdf pattern in the blog post *** **skill level ** beginner **materials ** chunky yarn in various colours 6 5 mm crochet hook tape measure darning needle scissors **yarn alternatives ** any chunky or 12 ply yarn should be suitable for this design size using the 6 5 mm hook and chunky yarn the blanket measures approximately 65 by 50
